entries.title: Future Plans
changes: Charles is going to Japan and Brazil! The airport in the world map will finally be used...

entries.title: Multiplayer Update
changes: Overhauled Arcade and added a new type of arcade game mode
Added online multiplayer

entries.title: Quality of Life Update
changes: Added 'Quick Restart' button in options menu (esc or p) for dance battles. Now you can quickly restart mid-song
Changed note offset slider to move in increments of 15ms instead of 20ms
Changed note offset slider to have higher minimum and maximum offset values by 50%
Worldmap music doesn't get restarted everytime you go back and forth to shop
Fixed a really problematic bug that was causing everyone to have issues with progressing, this one is a major fix.
Added cute Charles art for the sleeping cutscene (more of that stuff coming soon!)
decorated various areas more and improved performance of VFX

entries.title: Post Launch Patch 4
changes: removed the note ID numbers, oops!
added text to clarify stuff on the world map
moved custom mode to Extras
added more fan art! Thank you
fixed Stingmis in her cutscene
improved performance on laptops that have two graphics cards by a lot

entries.title: Post Launch Patch 3
changes: fixed steam achievements again...
fixed custom songs not starting, caused by Note Per Minute value not having a default
fixed note offset not saving to hard drive and cloud saves
fixed more gamestate issues, mort will now appear properly and there should be no remaining sequence breaking between cutscenes
Efixed missing Devious Mort visual effects
refactored the World Map a bit to be more clear

entries.title: Post Launch Patch 1
changes: fixed steam achievements and fixed free roam mode when going back somewhere you already completed
cleaned up unused files for smaller download size
fixed a blocker that prevented people who own the dlc from playing the dlc content
Fixed music bugs, damage bugs, smoke bugs, text box bugs, and many more!
added some sounds

entries.title: Pre-Launch Preparation
changes: Changed how sensitive the note timings are. There is a 33% more generous margin of error!
Overhauled arcade menu, added lots of opponents and changed how the decoration works
Added keyboard scrolling for the arcade menu
Revamped the cutscenes and dialogue potions of the game to look better
Changed the night-time lighting outdoors
Added some functionality for Charles to steer better at night, as long as you're going in the right direction

entries.title: Demo Update 4
changes: Credits are more verbose
Changed the 'Play' menu
Fixed a bug where the wrong opponent would get chosen on Night 1

entries.title: Demo Update 3
changes: Switched Smooth Samuel and Rotten Roger in the story mode
Added Dialogues with the random bees that fly around. Try talking to them by pressing 'E'

entries.title: Demo Update 2
changes: Added hard mode and easy mode for Arcade and Story!
Changed the scoring system. Streaks/Combos shouldn't matter as much as before (they used to be the only thing that mattered basically)
Changed the letter grade system on the recap screen
Changed art on the title screen for better contrast with interactive elements
Added a 'quit to title' button in the options menu

entries.title: Demo Update 1
changes: Reduced CPU usage of the game by 50%
Shrunk the overworld levels by 20%. This will make it seem like there are more bees and hazards without increasing the amounts.
Added recap screen that shows the breakdown of your performance and your opponent's performance
Changed how wrong-notes are displayed
Added more flowers and pollen to all overworld levels
Added a small cutscene when going into the hive after gathering pollen
Fixed a bug with loading day 3 night time
